meanings.definition: Relating to the act of defining something.
meanings.sent1: The definitional process helped us understand the concept better.
meanings.sent2: Her definitional skills were crucial in clarifying the meaning of the term.
meanings.sent3: The definitional debate turned into a fun game of guessing definitions.
meanings.sent4: His definitional approach to the problem shed light on a new perspective.
meanings.sent5: The definitional exercise made the concept crystal clear.

meanings.sent1: The definitional examples provided a clear explanation of the topic.
meanings.sent2: The definitional statement left no room for confusion.
meanings.sent3: Her definitional drawings made the complex idea easy to grasp.
meanings.sent4: The definitional video simplified the intricate process.
meanings.sent5: The definitional chart visually represented the key points.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to a definition.
meanings.sent1: The definitional terms used in the document were precise.
meanings.sent2: His definitional approach to the problem was systematic.
meanings.sent3: The definitional study group made learning definitions enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: The definitional framework provided a structured way to approach the topic.
meanings.sent5: The definitional analysis highlighted the key components.
